page.title: 02A Day in Claire's Life
page.content: On a{school day}I have to get up at {7:30.}My mum gets up at 6:30 but my sister and my dad get up around the same time as me. For breakfast I usually have toast or cornflakes.My mum gets up so early because she has to go and do a few jobs at the farm.{I {arrive at school at 8:30.}When I go into the playground if my friends are there I go to meet them.{My favourite {lessons at school are games and art. I {travel to school by car}and my mum or dad comes to pick up my sister and me after school to take us home. {At the weekend I go riding}at a local stables, on a chestnut horse called Flicka or a pony called Lancelot. Sometimes{I go riding through the {woods near my home.}I enjoy this very much.
